# read chunk (does not run code)
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
read_chunk('example.R')
```

# run the variablesXY chunk and use the variables it creates
```{r first}
<<variablesXY>>
head(data.frame(x,y))

```

# run the plotXY chunk and create the plot
```{r second}
<<plotXY>>
```
